headline.main: FINNS' ENVOY SAYS FIGHT MUST GO ON; Procope Asserts Nation Must Continue Even if Harming U.S. Interests Inadvertently

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27 -- Finland must for her own security continue fighting against the Russians in East Karelia even if by so doing she inadvertently harms the interests of the United States, Hjalmar J. Procope, the Finnish Minister, declared today at a special press conference.
abstract: Procope says war must go on
